text: Odoo erga rakkoon isa tuqee booda rahmata Nu irraa ta’e isa dhandhamsiifnee silaa “kun anaaf mala; ani Qiyaaman ni dhaabbatti jedhee hin yaadu; yoon gara Gooftaa kiyyaa deebifames, Isa bira (carraa) gaariitu naaf jira” jedhaDhugumatti, warra kafaran waan isaan hojjachaa turan isaanitti odeessinee, adabbii ulfaataas isaan dhandamsiisuuf jirra
